reviews.review:
This game has +50,000 positive reviews. I don't see the point in writing detailed review... 

Just go and buy it.

Portal 2 é um jogo obrigatório da Steam, ele entra em desconto periódicamente, então espere as promoções para comprar, além da campanha o jogo ganha uma vida útil extratosféricamente maior devido aos seus mods na Steam em coop.
Cmon, best came, just look at me, im a goat, and even i like it.

Immer wieder gut!
Ausgezeichnete Story und wahnsinniger Spaß!

Al ser una secuela, nunca me fijé que los de valve se hubieran currado haciendo Portal 2, ahora, con mis palabras, OBRA MAESTRA Y TAMBIÉN ÉPICA, ¿y por qué digo esto? Por lo que veréis en este análisis, empezemos:
Mecánica || La hicieron bien, tenemos que pasar por las industrias antiguas de aperture science, y por algunas salas de pruebas de la precuela de este, y en esta, ayudaremos a GLaDOS a desacerse de Weathley, por ahí, me encanta, hicieron bien la historia, todo concuerda con el final de la precuela
A la hora de jugar || Aquí quería llegar, nunca ví más acción, como en este, tienes que ser inteligentes a la hora de poner los portales, además de que el juego es de estrategia y también hay más acción que aventura, desde saltos increíbles con portales hasta caída libre, en serio, nunca me ví tan asombrado con tanta acción y movimiento de este juego
Sin duda alguna, este juego vale la pena comprarlo (sobre todo en las rebajas, que lo suelen poner a 5 o 6 euros) ya que cuando no hay nada en especial, cuesta siempre 15 euros, y eso fastidia a algunos jugadores que quieren el juego, pero en serio, vale la pena comprarlo, cuando veas lo épico que es el juego, estarás orgulloso de al verlo comprado, y hablando del modo Cooperativo, buah, solo digo, la gran mayoría de los niveles, son muy épicos, asi que vale también la pena jugarlo con un amigo, ya que os echaréis unas risas || Valoración personal: 11/10 (Ese punto extra lo pongo por lo del Co-op épico, eso ya...) || Portal 2, es una obra maestra || Very Good Game -- Muy Recomendable, saludos
Ce jeu est l'un de mes meilleurs jeux que j'ai joué ! ! ! !
Symulator LOGIKI i TROLLOWANIA KUMPLI, naprawde dobry sposobów na zabawe i ostre wkurzanie przyjaciela, ŚMIECH BEZCENNY z obu stron mikrofona.

The story in this game is longer and harder than the original's and the co-op is really fun. The game with just the co-op might be worth it on it's own but the story really eleveates it. Though I got it on sale, 20 bucks sounds pretty fair, and a 35 dollar two pack is a pretty decent deal as well if you wanna play it with a friend that doesn't have it.

The first game won me over so hard that I couldn't wait to give this one a try and in a world where sequels can fall short, Portal 2 delivers like no other.

Portal 2 хорошая игра. Я люблю играть в Portal 2.

В Portal 2 все предметы есть для создания камер. Так же есть программы в которых находятся другие предметы. Но зато не где нет стёкал трёх. Есть только прямое стекло (так я думаю). Но зато у меня есть три стекла это: стекло кривое на пол, стекло наклонное, стекло кривое на стену. Я их создал случайно. У меня просто стекло глюкнуло на повороте оно остановилось по диагонали. Стекло наклонное и стекло кривое на стену у меня появились когда я на стены ставил стекло прямое. А стекло кривое на пол у появилось когда я на полу ставил стекло прямое.

Я уже из стёкал создал много камер.

This game is great! (I am not gonna lie.)
This game has lot of puzzle, ton of stage and this game has co-op too!!
Please play this game and you have hours of fun!!!
(And please play co-op with me. I am lonely.)
Офигенный сюжет заслуживает 3-ю часть , но зная Valve они ее не сделают либо сделают после моей смерти , а так эта игра прекрасна .

Portal 1 güzeldi fakat amaçlanan gibi bir sade Puzzle oyunuydu, hikayesi vardı ama her bölüm başı ve sonunda bir kaç cümle söylenilip geçiliyordu. Fakat Portal 2 tam Puzzle ve hikaye arasında kalmış ve harika olmuş. Hikaye ilk oyunun güzel hikayesinden daha da güzel geçiyor. Arada zekice şakalar koyulup sade bir Puzzle oyunu gibi hissetmiyor.

     Tabi ilk başta amacınız sade bir puzzle oyunu ise 2. oyun daha kolay olduğu için size yeterli gelmeyebilir. Bunu için Workshop'taki topluluk tarafından yapılan haritalar eklenmiş böylece oynadığınız sürenin iki katını geçirebilirsiniz.

     Tek başına'da yapılabilen Co-op puzzle'llarıyla arkadaşınızla oynamak daha da eğlenceli. Böylece ilk bitiren siz olabilirseniz arkadaşınıza "Salak, gerizekalı v.b" hakaret ederek üstünlüğünüzü belirteblieceksiniz.
It has excellent story,compared with 《Portal》,and better puzzles.

А я у мамы умный,портал прошел.

A sequal to Valves 2007 Masterpiece Portal was never going to be easy but in 2011 Portal 2 graced our screens and truely expanded on what was already quite a rich universe. 

Portal 2 continues the Mythos of the Apature science building and is rather magical in the sense of its a sequal that doesnt seem to fall into being "A retred of old ground" while also avoiding the pitfall of being "To different" the balance is quite wonderful in balancing the old portal test chambers you know and love and further allowing exploration beyond the test chambers. The Graphics are as sharp as ever for a 4 year old game and feel crisp and sharp, the storyline picks up after the events of portal and it quickly becomes clear that the dark humour that was heavily present in the original game has not escaped the sequal expect plenty of Laugh out loud moments . the controls are on the nail with only a couple of occasions I can recount where the controlling of the character was ever an issue, its one of those games where if you screw up you know it's on you rather than the game. 

I hold only one personal issue with this game and that is that to me it doesnt quite feel as tight as it's predecessor. while I love the idea of a free and sprawling game with which to use the portal gun once the free roaming levels begin I feel the game slows down a touch as your forced to think of unique solutions to getting to the next level of the game. the chambers feel fine but these underground sections never hung as tightly to me. though I suppose it's the rose tinted glasses talking for my preference for the original Portal. 

Pick this game up. it's essential playing if your a gamer. if you havent played the original Portal then good lord go and play that first because it's beautiful. if you have played the original portal why are you reading reviews for the sequal this should be in your download cue already...it may not be a perfect game to me but it's a bloody good one.
fun but hard
Очень интересная и увлекательная игра. Много различных головоломок и забавных и милых эпизодов) Советую игру тем, кто любит поломать голову)

Portal 2 czyli kolejna już odsłona znanej nam bardzo dobrze gry "Portal". Nasza gra polega na rozwiązywaniu łamigłówek, aby przedostać się do kolejnego poziomu. Możemy tutaj oczywiście zagrać samemu, bądź z kolegą. Są to 2 oddzielne tryby i nie wpływają na naszą przygodę, którą przykłądowo zaczeliśmy w trybie jednoosobowym. Gra posiada BARDZO rozbudowaną fabułe. Jeśli nie grałeś w 'Portal" to radzę najpierw uruchomić poprzednią część po to, aby poznać cała wcześniejszą przygodę. Kolejna odsłona dodaje ze sobą nowe dodatki z którymi spotkamy się na poziomach. Grafika jest piękna, sam system działania gry jest genialny. Główny robot GlaDos, którego spotykamy już w pierwszej części, ma teksty które rozbawią nie jedną osobę. Każdy poziom kryje w sobie coś nowego, dzięki czemu ta gra staje się jeszcze bardziej ciekawsza.
Serdecznie polecam tą grę. Cena 15 euro - czyli około 62 zł. Cena może i duża jak na grę z 2011 roku, ale warta. Bardzo mile spędziłem przy niej czas.

If you're interested in Portal 2 because you enjoyed Portal, think twice. Portal 2 doesn't have the same emotional feel, satisfying conclusion, or wry seriousness throughout. The problems start from the beginning and really don't let up, although the puzzles are interesting enough to keep that part of your mind engaged. 

-----SPOILER ALERT-----

Apparently many years have passed and animals have evolved so that they terrify humans, and humans now worship giant apes - or something. That's farcial, and this underlying lack of seriousness leaves you rolling your eyes at the sophmoricism on display throughout the game. Of course, GLADOS wakes up and must be killed all over again, but this time she is not killed, but reduced to a potato. Yes, you read that right. More farcial humor. (She's also feasted on by a bird later on.)

The geography doesn't make much sense, either. Parts of the game are set in a giant salt mine, which exists apparently in the middle of nowhere, Iowa. Seriously. There's no evidence that any mining activity takes place in the local area. 

The puzzles are ok, with none of them as difficult as the last few in Portal, which is kind of disappointing. I'm no masochist, but I found if I didn't get the puzzle in 20 minutes, if I slept on it, I'd figure it out the next day. It wasn't terribly challenging. The atmosphere is appropriately eerie and occasionally unsettling. 

The game is also way too long - it's at least 8 chapters, and I only kept playing to see what the ending was. Unfortunately, the ending is completely unsatisfying. Once you reach it, you end up opening a portal to the moon (funny how the Portal gun fizzles out after distances even half that everywhere else in the game), and chucking Wheatley into space. If that wasn't bad enough, then after you reach the surface, you're treated to more silliness - Wheatley floating in space, talking, and Glados singing a song. It reduces the whole impression of something meaningful and sinister created by the first game to some spat between frenemies in junior high. It's ridiculous. 

So while the puzzles were fairly enjoyable, and the atmosphere generally involving, everything else about the game was sub par.
Un gran juego de manos de Lord Newell, excelente modo cooperativo y una campaña inolvidable

Immerse yourself in this challenging puzzle game based around inter portal travel through Apeture science test chambers. You play as chell the cheeky test subject (with an astonashing 50 mins worth of dialogue) just a girl trying to find freedom however the mendacious robot Glados gets in the way of your path. Join chell in a journey through the rift and dimensions of gravity deceiving inter-dimensional travel in a quest for hope and.........freedom

I played this game right after finishing the first Portal, and finished it in 4 days, which  is beyond fast for me. Then I turned around and replayed the entire thing in 3 days. 

I can't play any other games any more, because they all seem bland in comparison to this one. RIP my backlog.
Great continuation of Portal. I can't wait to see how the story progresses.
